p: This review summarizes the food, including sweeteners, and food products for the ketogenic dietary treatment of neurological diseases, describing their nutritional characteristics, giving indications for the use of the different products, and considering their metabolic and health effects. We analyzed the commonly-used KDs foodstuffs with high and low amounts of fat and carbohydrates, and sweeteners, selecting this food from that used by general population. A description is then given of food products specifically designed for KDs, and we illustrate food alternative to traditional cereal-based food.
